message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Constructive, low-volatility session for mid/small caps. Leadership in pharma (Laurus, Biocon), exchanges/depositories (BSE, CDSL) and PSU/cap goods (BHEL). Metals mixed with SAIL soft; telecom towers (IndusTower) continue to base under resistance. Our book stayed resilient with BSE/BHEL firm, LTF holding the 295–300 zone, CDSL above 1600.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Hold/Trail; add on breakout", "reason": "Momentum intact if it powers through 301.5; trail risk to ~291 to protect gains.", "price": 296.50},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Add on breakout or controlled dip", "reason": "Theme strong; clean trigger above 2873 or buy retests near 2795–2805 with tight stop.", "price": 2834.10},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Add on retest/strength", "reason": "Holding >1600; prefer adds near 1595–1610 or strength through 1665–1670.", "price": 1605.70},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "signal": "Hold/Trail; add on strength", "reason": "Follow-through above 292 can extend PSU leg; trail existing to ~278–280.", "price": 289.10},
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Add on strength only", "reason": "Supply near 430–432; cleaner momentum only on a high-volume push through that band.", "price": 420.90},
    {"symbol": "LAURUSLABS", "signal": "Hold/Trail; add on strength", "reason": "Pharma leadership; add above 1025; trail existing to ~965–975.", "price": 1006.90},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Momentum add on breakout", "reason": "Continuation trigger above 117.5; use ~111.5 stop on fresh adds.", "price": 114.96},
    {"symbol": "INDUSTOWER", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Coiling base; decisive move >415 can start a fresh leg; risk marker ~392.", "price": 402.20},
    {"symbol": "GMRAIRPORT", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "Big volume expansion and strong close; trigger above 105 with stop ~99.5.", "price": 103.72},
    {"symbol": "BIOCON", "signal": "Buy on strength", "reason": "Relative strength in pharma; cleaner continuation above 423; risk to ~405.", "price": 421.60},
    {"symbol": "RVNL", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Tight range; momentum above 328 could resume the up-move; stop ~311 on fresh buys.", "price": 321.20},
    {"symbol": "SAIL", "signal": "Manage risk; strength-only adds", "reason": "Structure weak below 140; consider adds only >145.2; if <136.8, trim to control risk.", "price": 138.90}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "LTF", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Protect gains if it loses the 291 pivot (breakdown risk).", "quantity": 7, "price": "SL-M 291.00"},
    {"symbol": "SAIL", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Cut partial if recent floor breaks to limit drawdown.", "quantity": 15, "price": "SL-M 136.80"}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 167.8,
    "total_value": 27407.3,
    "holdings_count": 8,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units @ 2385.00 (CMP 2834.10)",
      "LTF: 14 units @ 275.59 (CMP 296.50)",
      "BEL: 10 units @ 419.45 (CMP 420.90)",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units @ 900.05 (CMP 1006.90)",
      "BHEL: 10 units @ 265.49 (CMP 289.10)",
      "SAIL: 30 units @ 142.68 (CMP 138.90)",
      "CDSL: 3 units @ 1617.60 (CMP 1605.70)",
      "NBCC: 10 units @ 114.14 (CMP 114.96)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Pharma leadership: Laurus strong; Biocon just under 423 trigger; LUPIN/ALKEM firm—prefer strength entries and trail winners.",
    "Exchanges/Depositories: BSE basing just under highs; CDSL holding >1600; MCX extended—prefer dips.",
    "PSU/Cap goods/Defence: BHEL constructive with follow-through potential; BEL needs >430–432; HAL trend intact; ABB/THERMAX cooled.",
    "Telecom towers: IndusTower coiling under 415; watch for high-volume breakout. Bharti Hexacom firm.",
    "Infra/Rail PSU: RVNL close to trigger >328; IRCON steady; HUDCO strong—look for 236–238 retests.",
    "Metals: SAIL soft and below 140 handle; HINDCOPPER steady; NAVA eased—use tight risk if buying dips.",
    "Banks/NBFC: LTF resilient in 295–300 band; PSU banks active (IDBI/UCO/IOB/CENTRALBK) but extended—avoid chasing; SBICARD weak.",
    "Renewables: INOXWIND volatile and weak today; WAAREEENER soft; KPIGREEN consolidating—wait for decisive breaks.",
    "Discretionary/FMCG: VOLTAS firm; MARICO/DABUR stable; JUBLFOOD needs >619 for momentum; TRENT steady.",
    "Execution: For Monday, avoid chasing gap opens (>0.7%); let opening range form and prefer pullback entries to triggers with predefined stops. Keep position sizes small given portfolio scale."
  ]
}
